Docs.param: An object that contains state information for this request.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous request to retrieve the latests events associated with a pull subscription.This method was introduced in the Microsoft Exchange Web Services (EWS) Managed API 1.2.
Docs.returns: A GetEventsResults containing a list of events associated with the subscription.

Docs.summary: Obtains a collection of events that occurred on the subscribed folders since the point in time that is defined by the property.
Docs.returns: The method returns a collection of events that occurred since the last watermark.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether more events are available on the server.
Docs.value: True if more events are available; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: The property is undefined until the method is called.
